name: Breaking Free: A Journey of Healing from High Demand Religious Groups

episodes.title: Interview with Cheryl Hope on therapy, moving forward and finding your voice by telling your story.
episodes.description: My incredible quest for this episode is Cheryl Hope, all the way from Canada. Cheryl is a survivor who has not only broken free from the same religious group that I escaped but has also faced horrific abuses within that very same group. Despite all of this, Cheryl has not only built a beautiful life for herself but is also fighting for others who may be subjected to the same traumas she endured, by becoming a pioneer in starting a movement to raise awareness through her remarkable podcast, 'Get A Life.' Her ability to smile and find strength in helping others is truly inspirational. Support the Show. https://www.instagram.com/breaking_free_with_cassie/ Email: breaking_free_with_cassie@proton.me

episodes.title: Interview with Ben Woodbury on Incredible Opportunities After Leaving
episodes.description: Join us as we explore the incredible story of Ben Woodbury, from his experiences within the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church to his rise as an interior designer extraordinaire, entrepreneur, and a genuine all-around great guy. This is an episode you won't want to miss! Support the Show. https://www.instagram.com/breaking_free_with_cassie/ Email: breaking_free_with_cassie@proton.me

episodes.title: Part 1 - My Journey After Leaving
episodes.description: Welcome to Part 1 of My Journey After Leaving a High Demand Religious Group https://oliveleaf.network/ https://www.lifeline.org.au/?gclid=CjwKCAjwvfmoBhAwEiwAG2tqzGu3VdUn_xteiW0VkVAAbhoskvy9CdYTUHJjRzcD7mJe6Wi5eLWLMxoCce8QAvD_BwE Get A Life - Ex-Cult Conversations (Episode 44) https://spotify.link/mrElZSG0FDb Support the Show. https://www.instagram.com/breaking_free_with_cassie/ Email: breaking_free_with_cassie@proton.me

episodes.title: Introducing Breaking Free: A Journey of Healing from High Demand Religious Groups
episodes.description: A quick introduction to Breaking Free: A Journey of Healing from High Demand Religious Groups. A little about what a hope to cover in future episodes and a shout out to you all, my trusty listeners to hit Subscribe and share so you are notified when my first episode is published. Also, reach out to me with your questions and come tell me your stories. I can't wait to bring you the first episode really soon!! Support the Show. https://www.instagram.com/breaking_free_with_cassie/ Email: breaking_free_with_cassie@proton.me
